ref: 10974 láva1 ʻ that which is cut off, fleece ʼ Mn., ʻ reaping ʼ Daś., ʻ fragment, particle ʼ MBh. [~ *rava -- 2. -- √lū]
Pk. lava -- m. ʻ small particle, drop ʼ;
Pk. lava -- m. ʻ small particle, drop ʼ;
K. lav m. ʻ grass dried and twisted into rough cables and kept for fodder ʼ;
L. lau m. ʻ reaping, 20 sheaves of corn ʼ;
P. laü, lau m. ʻ crop, a cutting (of grass, corn, &c.) ʼ;
G. lav m. ʻ particle ʼ, adj. ʻ small ʼ.
